name: Foodies Food Delivery App
description: A Food Delivery App using Angular 17 and Bootstrap. Project includes registering the user, user account, menu/cart, retrieving/ sending orders, order history, and searching stores by name and category.

name: FilmLand Movie App
description: FilmLand is a movie search application built with React, allowing users to explore a vast database of movies and get details about specific films.

name: Chirp Social Media App
description: I created this full MERN Stack Social Media App using React, Tailwind CSS, Next.JS, Prisma, MongoDB Atlas, and the principles of Responsive Layout. Project includes features such as login, editing profiles, registration, notifications, following users, and commenting.

name: Gemini Clone App
description: This React app is a clone of the Google Gemini AI assistant. It allows users to input prompts and receive AI-generated responses. It includes pre-loader animation for loading responses, typing effect for a more natural feel and responsive design for various screen sizes.
